thread.title: One Direction’s Louis Tomlinson arrested at LAX after paparazzi scuffle

author: Associated Press
title: One Direction’s Louis Tomlinson arrested at LAX after paparazzi scuffle
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email One Direction’s Louis Tomlinson arrested at LAX after paparazzi scuffle Singer's lawyer says photographers provoked him when he asked them to stop filming. A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. 1 To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs One Direction’s Louis Tomlinson arrested at LAX after paparazzi scuffle Associated Press Published 4:32 p.m. ET March 4, 2017 | Updated 43 minutes ago A lawyer for One Direction singer Louis Tomlinson says paparazzi provoked him into a fight as he left LAX on Friday. (Photo: Vivien Killilea, Getty Images) 53 CONNECT 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
LOS ANGELES — One Direction singer Louis Tomlinson has been arrested for allegedly attacking a photographer at Los Angeles International Airport, an incident his lawyer described as “provoked” by paparazzi. 
The incident happened Friday after Tomlinson, arriving on a flight with his girlfriend, Eleanor Calder, asked a photographer to stop filming. After an alleged scuffle, the photographer made a citizen’s arrest on Tomlinson. 
Police responded and took Tomlinson into custody. He was later released, and a court date was set for March 29. 
Martin Singer, his lawyer, in a statement said the paparazzi “provoked and caused the altercation” and that Tomlinson came to his girlfriend’s defense after she was being “attacked.” 
One Direction, which formed in 2010, has had hits including Drag Me Down , Story of My Life , What Makes You Beautiful , Perfect and Best Song Ever . Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2lqYyKF
